heading: testimony over
subheading: white house aide sidney blumenthal wrapped up his deposition wednesday -- meaning the three witnesses selected by house prosecutors to testify in the president clinton impeachment trial have said their say. now republicans are expected to try and push for live testimony by blumenthal, vernon jordan, and monica lewinsky, although that appears unlikely. also looking shaky is the chance of getting an actual conviction. a number of republican senators, particularly those facing reelection bids, are reportedly uneasy with the idea of actually driving clinton from office.
author: wired staff
text: white house aide sidney blumenthal wrapped up his deposition wednesday -- meaning the three witnesses selected by house prosecutors to testify in the president clinton impeachment trial have said their say. now republicans are expected to try and push for live testimony by blumenthal, vernon jordan, and monica lewinsky, although that appears unlikely. also looking shaky is the chance of getting an actual conviction. a number of republican senators, particularly those facing reelection bids, are reportedly uneasy with the idea of actually driving clinton from office.
